Agilent instrument drivers¶

Agilent devices are suppported via their IVI drivers. See the Python IVI documentation.

class ivi.agilent.agilent34401A(*args, **kwargs)¶

Agilent 34401A IVI DMM driver

__call__(max_time=1)¶

Read a measurement and return its value.

doc(obj=None, itm=None, docs=None, prefix=None)¶

Python IVI documentation generator

help(itm=None, complete=False, indent=0)¶

Python IVI help system

class ivi.agilent.agilentE3641A(*args, **kwargs)¶

Agilent E3641A IVI DC power supply driver

__call__(value, output=0)¶

Set the voltage of the specified output.

doc(obj=None, itm=None, docs=None, prefix=None)¶

Python IVI documentation generator

help(itm=None, complete=False, indent=0)¶

Python IVI help system
